name: Garden of Eden: Snails of Calamity
name_original: Garden of Eden: Snails of Calamity
description:
In the Garden of Eden, there is a civil war among the different snail clans. Shoot eye lasers to kill the other snails and defeat your opponents to become the sole victor. Why can they shoot lasers out of their eyes? Don't ask.

How to Play:

1 player can join on keyboard/mouse, the others must join with controllers

Move with Left joystick, fire with right trigger, dodge/shield with left trigger.
